casebody.data:
In re M.M.

[Cite as In re M.M., 122 Ohio St.3d 541, 2009-Ohio-4048.]

(Nos. 2009-0090 and 2009-0318 Submitted July 14, 2009 Decided August 18, 2009.) Richard A.F. Lipowicz, for appellant Jessica Lairson. Flanagan, Lieberman, Hoffman & Swaim and Richard Hempfling, for appellant Kathy Richards. Mathias H. Heck Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Johnna M. Shia, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee, Montgomery County Children Services.

{¶ 1} The certified question is answered in the negative and the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of In re Schaefer, 111 Ohio St.3d 498, 2006-Ohio-5513, 857 N.E.2d 532.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
